DOC.brief_summary: Vitamin D receptors are expressed in activated different immune cells. It is not known, which immune cell type is targeted by exogenous vitamin D. Here, vitamin D-deficient individuals will receive once 100.000 I.U. vitamin D3 either intramuscular or subcutaneous in a double-blind placebo controlled setting. Immune cells will be monitored from the blood over time.
DOC.brief_title: Immunologic Action of a Single Dose Cholecalciferol
DOC.detailed_description: Vitamin D-deficient individuals will receive once - double-blind, placebo controlled 100.000 I.U.vitamin D3 - intramuscular or subcutaneous Blood will be taken over time and - immune cells (T cells, B cells, myeloid antigen presenting cells) are characterized by flow-cytometry - vitamin D-metabolites will be monitored
